description: [Tarrask](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1011) is able to create “hidden” scheduled tasks by deleting the Security Descriptor (`SD`) registry value.(Citation: Tarrask scheduled task)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence Team & Detection and Response Team . (2022, April 12). Tarrask malware uses scheduled tasks for defense evasion. Retrieved June 1, 2022.
